name: Silver Lining (Sebastian Bertzell, Visarx, gittne, bensimonschelhaas)
name_original: Silver Lining (Sebastian Bertzell, Visarx, gittne, bensimonschelhaas)
description:
Gunshots. Screams. Loud thuds on the ground. Those are the first sounds you register after regaining your consciousness. You find yourself in a building, more specifically a hospital, with no recollection of how you got there and why. As the sounds become louder and louder, your pulse rises and  panic starts to set in. You can only think of one thing: to escape from the building and whatever is happening in it

PS. The game features a "how to" play page. 

Thanks from the  Artware Crew!
